page.title: 01LANDSCAPE
page.content: THE VILLAGE OF KILLEN IS SITUATED AT A CROSSROADS ON THE MAIN LONDONDERRY TO ENNISKILLEN ROAD, THREE MILES FROM CASTLEDERG. "KILLEN" MEANS A SMALL CHURCH OR A SMALL WOOD BUT THERE IS NEITHER CHURCH OR CHAPEL IN KILLEN AND MOST OF THE TREES HAVE BEEN CUT DOWN. THE DOMESDAY PROJECT BLOCK IS ROUGHLY THE CATCHMENT AREA OF KILLEN CONTROLLED PRIMARY SCHOOL. THE SCHOOL IS BUILT ON A SMALL HILL AND THE BLOCK IS SURROUNDED BY SIX SMALL HILLS AND THE BIN MOUNTAIN, SO THAT THE WHOLE BLOCK CAN BE SEEN FROM THE SCHOOL GROUNDS.
